items.content_html: A versatile UI component library with built-in support for both dark and light modes. Users can easily customize components globally or locally, following a lightweight CSS framework aligned with HTML standards. It also provides multiple themes and a user-friendly color scheme generator.
items.title: ioak-io/basicui: A versatile UI component library with built-in support for both dark and light modes. Users can easily customize components globally or locally, following a lightweight CSS framework aligned with HTML standards. It also provides multiple themes and a user-friendly color scheme generator.

items.content_html: Rivulex is a lightweight, efficient library that provides an easy-to-use abstraction over Redis Streams, simplifying message brokering with at-least-once delivery guarantees. Built for seamless integration into Node.js environments, it ensures reliable, high-performance message distribution with minimal overhead.
items.title: raw-leak/rivulex: Rivulex is a lightweight, efficient library that provides an easy-to-use abstraction over Redis Streams, simplifying message brokering with at-least-once delivery guarantees. Built for seamless integration into Node.js environments, it ensures reliable, high-performance message distribution with minimal overhead.

items.content_html: WebSocket Chat Server with Socket.IO This project is a lightweight and scalable chat server built with Node.js and Socket.IO. It provides real-time, bidirectional communication between clients, making it ideal for chat applications, collaborative tools, and live data updates.
items.title: JulieBenchuk/chat-server: WebSocket Chat Server with Socket.IO This project is a lightweight and scalable chat server built with Node.js and Socket.IO. It provides real-time, bidirectional communication between clients, making it ideal for chat applications, collaborative tools, and live data updates.
